dict.string: FamliCal needs access to your contacts to let you quickly add drivers from your contact list when creating events.
FamliCal needs access to your calendars to display family events and allow you to create and manage appointments.
FamliCal needs full calendar access to add new family events, reminders, alerts, and travel time blocks to your calendars.
FamliCal writes new family events, reminders, alerts, and travel time blocks to your calendars.
